entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
